title: 各位大佬用的都是什么显卡
author: SHIMH
txt_content:
本人穷B，用的AMD核显，原版平均150
帧还好，带几个大型mod瞬间掉到50帧，惨不忍睹

replies.author: ljh221
replies.txt_content: 750ti表示开个光影个位帧数

replies.author: lasobra
replies.txt_content: 。。。我比你好点 不过 凑合玩吧

replies.author: ItsZeroHikari
replies.txt_content: GT630

replies.author: asjkdaskljda
replies.txt_content:
9800gt
GT610
gt720
gts250

replies.author: AloneObserver
replies.txt_content: gtx 1060，开光影有时候会掉下60帧

replies.author: zhuhaopeng
replies.txt_content: gt720还是二手的

replies.author: li12332112
replies.txt_content: 1060用的表示还算可以

replies.author: Akkariin
replies.txt_content:
RTX 2080 Ti
NVIDIA Tesla x4

replies.author: huangzx9239
replies.txt_content: hd6570,垃圾显卡

replies.author: Оil
replies.txt_content:
950M……
带一些工程软件是够用了。
毕竟个人又不是专职渲染的……虽然有渲染的心但是一设备不行二也没什么时间去学……

replies.author: ANRV
replies.txt_content: GT615M 欧耶

replies.author: tpaccept13
replies.txt_content: 我原来有个GT 740M用来运行Minecraft后报废了，主菜单都没加载出来

replies.author: NoName德里奇
replies.txt_content:
OKcf 发表于 2019-5-30 22:55
9800gt
GT610
gt720
我怀疑你是图吧来的奸细.jpg

replies.author: NoName德里奇
replies.txt_content:
我是智商检测卡1050，玩玩MC，开开光影，不成问题。
我不追求上百帧的FPS，我只要50-60帧就可以爽玩了。

replies.author: 45gfg9
replies.txt_content:
我寻思着带mod也不要显卡啊
别问，问就是Radeon Pro 560
AMD YES!

replies.author: asjkdaskljda
replies.txt_content:
NoName德里奇 发表于 2019-5-31 11:32
我怀疑你是图吧来的奸细.jpg
这些显卡又不是不能用.jpg

replies.author: Coptimistic
replies.txt_content:
Akkariin 发表于 2019-5-31 00:13
RTX 2080 Ti
NVIDIA Tesla x4
不介意的话拆下来一块给我可以吗

replies.author: Coptimistic
replies.txt_content: GTX1050 人称智商检测卡 还行吧也没有那么不堪，
在用 NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060

replies.author: z49777883
replies.txt_content: gtx1060吧

replies.author: 散落丶丿星辰
replies.txt_content: 攒攒钱，逛逛图拉丁吧，你会发现一个新世界

replies.author: lqy671
replies.txt_content: 我笔记本用的1050ti

replies.author: mc小学神
replies.txt_content: gt720，其实你卡应该与显卡无关，它就是个处理画面的，主要处理光影和材质包。mc主要烧CPU
